name: C/C Refractory Panel "Stork"
description: A 10,600 m² array of carbon-carbon composite structural panels with refractory oxide surface treatment — a materials combination developed for high-enthalpy atmospheric re-entry structures and adapted for sustained 1100 K space radiation service. The composite's low areal density (2.6 kg/m²) keeps the array lighter than the titanium Heron despite spanning three times the area. Required for vessels running segmented cascade or SP-100 class thermoelectric generators.
